tool_description: Estimates operational and capital costs for transit routes including vehicle procurement, fuel, labor, maintenance, and infrastructure expenses.

daily_service_hours.description: Daily vehicle service hours for each route

vehicle_unit_cost.description: Purchase cost per vehicle in thousands (100-2000)

fuel_cost_per_km.description: Fuel cost per kilometer in currency units (0.5-3.0)

maintenance_cost_factor.description: Annual maintenance as fraction of vehicle cost (0.05-0.15)

infrastructure_cost_per_km.description: Infrastructure cost per route-km in thousands (50-500)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: route_lengths and daily_service_hours must have equal lengths.
Invalid cost parameters: Check ranges for vehicle_unit_cost (100-2000k), fuel_cost_per_km (0.5-3.0), driver_hourly_wage (15-80).
Invalid maintenance factor: maintenance_cost_factor must be between 0.05-0.15.
Invalid infrastructure cost: infrastructure_cost_per_km must be between 50-500 thousand.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_years must be between 1-30.
usage: Provide route characteristics and fleet requirements. Configure cost parameters for vehicles, fuel, labor, and infrastructure. Returns comprehensive cost breakdown.

annual_operating_cost.description: Total annual operating cost in currency units

cost_per_route_km.description: Annual operating cost per kilometer for each route

cost_breakdown.description: Cost components [vehicles, fuel, labor, maintenance, infrastructure]
